inn1.comm: slightly back of length on the off stump, de Kock stays back and defends it back
on good length this time around off with some outswing, he doesn't move his feet at all and blocks
swing and a miss! He chases this outswinger from length outside off, and it shapes away enough to beat him
middles it this time off the back foot to cover point with a punch
fuller around off and it's driven to cover point again, bit of fumble but no run
flashes it over the point region and gets four! He got enough room this time to free his arms, it was fullish too and he swung it over point well in the air for four
length delivery outside off and Amla lets it go
wider outside off and it's punched to deep point for one. That's why there's no third man
good take by Ramdin as Holder bowls a back of length wide down leg

that's gone high in the air, easy catch for point and de Kock's return lasts only seven balls. De Kock pulled the short ball which had good bounce, he didn't get in the right position and a top edge went in the air for Carter. His bottom hand came off the bat has he swiveled on the back foot to make up for the extra bounce
angles it down the leg side for another wide
length delivery close to off is defended back
leans forward and blocks the length delivery from outside off into the covers
angled in this time towards off stump, Faf goes back and pushes it down to mid on
bangs in a short ball with the angle outside off, Amla stays back and defends it
full but nice inswing to not give Amla much room outside off, he pushes it down to mid off
right on the stumps with inswing again, pushed down to mid on this time off the back foot
towards middle and leg now, errs a bit with the line and Amla tucks it off the pads with the swing wide of short fine leg for four
too wide outside off now, but Amla punches it straight to cover point
on the other side of short fine leg now, four more! Another delivery on the leg stump shaping in, Amla stays back and clips it fine down the leg side for four
back of length outside off and shaping away, good bounce as it's left alone
length delivery and closer to off, but wide enough to be left alone
closer to off, holds its line after pitching and Faf leaves patiently again
Faf shuffles across this time and pushes the length delivery from outside off with sift hands to mid on for a quick single
there's no third man and Amla places it right there for four! It was a short ball and well outside off, Amla flashed at it and sent it in the air easily over short third man
outside off, but better line and Amla lets it go this time
starts the over with a wide well outside off as it goes further away with the angle
better line closer to off stump, Faf leans forward and blocks
right on target now, swings it in towards off and middle from middle, Faf defends carefully to midwicket
just outside off on good-length again, no room whatsoever and he blocks it back
shorter on the off stump which gives Faf a bit of time to tuck it wide of midwicket for one
angles it across now well outside off, left alone easily
back of length on the pads with some swing, Amla hops back and tucks to square leg for one
fullish outside off and Amla caresses it along the ground to sweeper cover for one
back of length and angling in from outside off, Faf stays back and defends
just back of length outside off, Faf taps it late towards point
even shorter outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover point
shuffles across, it's pitched even wider and Faf punches it off the back foot just wide of point in the gap for four
shapes it away this time from length outside off, leaves it this time
hooks the short ball, it's gone high and goes all the way! The bouncer was on middle and leg, Amla hooked and got a top edge, and it got enough to go over the fine leg boundary for six
doesn't bounce that much now, it was outside off with the angle, Amla chased and it went under the bat
too full to trouble Amla, there's inswing and he whips it through the leg side between midwicket and mid on for four. Not sure if he middled that, the bat turned in his hands while hitting the shot
leans forward and a bit and pushes the ball into the covers
waits for the length delivery outside off and runs it down to third man for one
punches it off the back foot down to mid off from outside off
driven uppishly but it's in the gap and is running away for four but Russell chases it all the way from cover and slides to push it in just in time
goes back and across for the short of length delivery and punches it wide of point in the gap for four more. These two batsmen are not having any troubles at all
better length and wide enough outside off to be left alone
blocks the incoming delivery from outside off to point
closer to off from back of length, he stays back and guides it to point again
bit wide outside off and he runs it down to third man for one
draws a thick outside edge straightaway, Faf was squared up as the ball didn't come in as much as he expected from outside off and it went to third man for one
back of length and angled in, Amla goes on his toes and defends on the leg side
it's wide, he chases and misses! It was short and wide, Amla flashed without moving his feet much and it went under his bat
much better delivery, beats him this time! It was touch fuller and came in, Amla didn't move much again and defended as the ball missed the outside edge
it comes in further towards the stumps, Amla pushes it down the ground
blocks the incoming delivery late towards point
short ball is pulled off off the back foot to deep backward square leg
back of length outside off, taps it down to third man
shapes it away a bit from length outside off, left alone
bit too full and straight on the stumps, Faf drives it on the on side between mid on and midwicket with his wrists
that's too much bounce and it beats everyone! Amla left the short ball outside off and it sprung away over the keeper's head for five wides
short of length outside off, Amla goes across a bit and whips it effortlessly to deep square leg

the short ball does it eventually, gets Faf! This one was angled in, Faf could not get on top of it while pulling and a top edge flew high and far towards deep fine leg for Cottrell. Faf gesutres with his hand knowing the steep bounce got the better of him
just around length outside off, he stays back and defends on leg
shortish outside off, pushed into the covers
drives the fullish ball on the leg side for one between mid on and midwicket
right on good length just outside off, Amla blocks it back
touch short of good length surprises Amla a bit with some bounce as he taps it to point
defends the length ball between point and cover point for a quick one
punches the short of length ball off the back foot to deep point
thick edge goes in the air but lands safe to go to third man! It was on middle and leg on short of length, he wanted to work it to leg but was squared up a bit to edge it on off
length delivery outside off is left alone easily
another wide goes over the keeper's head, this time Ramdin doesn't even try as the bouncer flies over everyone for five wides
tight on good length just outside off, Amla defends towards cover and takes a quick single
angled across the off stump, he defends it on the off side
bouncer to end the over on middle and leg, he lets it go
he tries to whack the length delivery outside off into the covers but gets an edge to the leg side
angled in towards off, defended to the leg side by closing the face of the bat for one
the bowler goes wide of the crease for this one, it's outside off and left alone
touch closer to off stump on length, defends off the back foot
works the back of length ball to deep square leg and the fielder comes in quickly to keep it to one
full on middle, whipped to deep backward for one
back of length outside off, pushed off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
angled across outside off, he lets it go to the keeper
pushes this one off the back foot to third man for one
back of length on middle, tucked to leg off the back foot for one
short ball and it's down the leg side for a wide
back of length outside off, pushed into the covers
too full outside off, driven firmly towards mid off for one and that's drinks
fullish on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
back of length outside off now, pushed to cover
back of length on middle, Rossouw stays back and turns it towards midwicket for one
angled in towards the batsman, clipped to fine leg for one
stops a bit before reaching the batsman from off, he hits the stumps with a pish down the ground
punches it off the back foot just wide of mid off and they steal one
pulled down the ground towards mid on, Holder dives full length to his right and stops it with one hand
another wide from Russell, thankfully Ramdin gets to it with a jump to his right
outside off with room, he chips it over the covers in the air for three as mid off chases it down
nearly beats Amla who looked to work it on leg but got an edge on the off side for one
swing and a miss! It was widish outside off with the angle, Rossouw chased and missed
edged in the air and falls safe! It was the extra bounce again, it surprised Rossouw on the back foot and the ball ballooned in the air, but right in between point and cover point
angled across outside the off stump on length, he lets it go
slashes at this length delivery outside off and misses! Didn't move his feet much for the drive and nearly got the outside edge
closer to the off stump and it's pushed down the ground to mid off
defends the ball fine behind square on off by playing it late and they steal a single
he charges down, Brathwaite pitches it short and doesn't give him any room at all, the batsman defends it back
looks to clip the ball from outside off to leg and gets an edge onto the pad, Amla calls him for a quick single
short of length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
on length around leg stump, pushed back to the bowler
slightly slower on middle stump, driven to sweeper cover for one
in the air, but safe again! It was full outside off, Amla chipped it over Sammy's head and it fell well short of mid off. Wasn't from the middle of the bat as the ball was slower than he expected
too full on off and he drives it down beautifully with a straight bat for two
inside edge nearly gets the stumps! It was angled across the stumps, Rossouw swished at it and the ball went to short fine leg after the edge
angles in the bouncer a little bit, Amla ducks under it easily
back of length outside off, punched down to mid off
closer to off stump now and he defends it back
room on offer and he crunches it through the covers for a cracking four! He errs for the first time with the length and Rossouw cashes in
beaten, beautiful delivery! This one had extra bounce as it was angled across, Rossouw looked to defend and was beaten outside off
short ball this time and he pulls it to deep backward square leg for one
too full to Amla this time and he drives it handsomely through the covers as Carter runs across to his right and slides to keep it to two
offcutter outside off, Rossouw pushes it to sweeper cover for one
touch back of length outside off, worked off the back foot towards midwicket for a quick one
on length on middle and leg, pushed to cover off the front foot
comes down this time and drives it back straight to the bowler, then hurries back into the crease
waits for the ball that's angled across and taps it late to third man

Amla also plays it late and unleashes the ramp shot as the ball came in, but was short enough for him to place it almost over the keeper's head on the off side. Third umpire having a look if Deonarine's effort was clean at the third man boundary, and it was
more fantastic placement from Amla as he goes back to a short ball and whips it backward of square to beat the man in the deep...although the fielding effort wasn't fantastic. Another fifty for Amla
full outside off, driven down to long off
full from round the wicket, pushed down the ground
flicks a straight delivery off his pads to short fine leg
worked through midwicket
too short again, Amla is on the back foot and whips it through straight midwicket
full and straight, flicked to midwicket
full outside off, driven square to backward point
worked away from off stump into the leg side
a rare occasion of him losing his shape on the shot, as the bat twists in his hand as he drives to mid on
slower ball outside off, 114kph, Amla waits a fraction longer and drives through the off side
tight run! But the throw from Sammy wasn't great. Rossouw pushed it into the off side, Sammy can across from his follow through and a lower throw to Ramdin could have found Amla short
round the wicket, driven back to the bowler
breaks loose with a strong slog-sweep, picked up from outside off stump and it hits the boundary marking full on, so that's six
flatter and fuller, bunted back to the bowler
short outside off, he rocks back and cracks it to cover where Gayle's dive takes the pace off the shot but the sweeper can't get in quickly enough to stop the second
tucked off the back foot through midwicket
whipped from outside off to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, punched to mid off
whips a full delivery off the stumps to midwicket
can't beat cover this time as he drives
loses his line onto leg stump and it's effortlessly flick away, in the air, backward of square to bisect deep square and long leg
angled into the pads, flicked to long leg
poor line on leg stump and it's a lovely pick-up shot off the hip by Rossouw to collect another boundary behind square on the leg side
short outside off, cut with fierce power but straight to backward point
fuller on off stump, the face of the bat closes as he works into the leg side
short of a length, gets an inside edge into the pads to the leg side
tries to force this through the off side but was cramped for room
cuts this into the off side, square to point, without much timing
short and helped down to long leg
driven to cover
tucked from outside off into midwicket
full on the stumps, driven to long off
short on leg stump and pulled backward of square, almost identical to the shot in the earlier over...poor bowling
just short! He came round the wicket, it was back of a length, driven on the up but didn't reach mid off
tucked into midwicket
charges down and hammers it straight down the ground over the bowler's head for an authoritative shot. Couple of bounces and over the rope
draws a thick outside edge outside off with a wobbled seam and change of pace, to third man for one
angles it in from back of length, Amla defends it on leg
slower one again, full outside off and it's driven down to mid off for one, brings up SA's 150
back of length outside off, taps it to point off the back foot
change of pace and Rossouw chips it in the air down to mid off, doesn't carry all the way
fullish delivery outside off and he drives it straight down to mid off
back of length towards off and it's turned off the back foot to deep square leg
beaten! He looked to push the length delivery outside off tentatively and missed it
defends it with soft hands towards point and wants one, Amla sends him back
bit too full and he middles it this time through the covers with a nice drive for two. His second ODI fifty
whips it away from leg towards deep fine leg off the pads and that's drinks
oh, what a way to welcome him back, that delivery outside off was tonked over the long-on boundary for a massive six. Looks so much more comfortable after his fifty
on the pads and it's clipped straight to the fielder
fullish outside off and it's pushed towards point for one
leading edge and it goes to third man as Amla tried to flick the slower legcutter from outside off to leg
slightly full outside off, he drives and misses
looked like a beamer but it was a slow full toss at 11kph and dipped in towards his pads, Amla helped it to short fine leg
that's short and Rossouw slams it on the leg side with a powerful pull by picking the length early. Lands just over the boundary rope for six
charges down for a big shot again, but misses outside off
full outside off, hammered down the ground and that nearly got Amla's crotch! Amla jumped and made way for the ball between his legs, also smiles as the ball goes for four
short ball, pulled for six again! He stays back for the short ball again and sent it over the square leg boundary. No ball for overstepping
slow and low wide outside off, free hit again
was that an attempted yorker? It's a full toss on the middle stump and Rossouw launches it over the midwicket boundary for six more! He loves that area, doesn't he!
comes down to slam another and manages it to deep square leg, but not off the middle, for one
another no ball over stepping as Amla came across to whip it on leg and missed and the ball went over the stumps
he makes room and almost pulls the short ball down the ground in the gap. It goes high and falls in no man's land as the fielder cuts in inside
he knows the field too well and taps that full ball nicely between backward point and short third man for four. Didn't have to use power for that one
slower ball but it's well down leg for a wide
this man's in great touch! Too full a delivery and he drives it handsomely nearly over the bowler's head wide of mid off for four

risky second run - the slower ball on middle was worked towards midwicket but there's no fielder there. The bowler chases it as the batsmen turn back for the second and Rossouw dives to make his ground. Direct hit would have had him in trouble
moves across a bit and pushes what was nearly a yorker into the covers
exposes his middle and leg stumps and taps the full delivery to point, wants a run but is sent back and makes it just in time
moves across again by exposing the stumps, Brathwaite bowls it just down leg and Amla misses, not called a wide and Amla isn't pleased about it
wants to slap it on off but gets an inside edge down to long on
angled in towards the batsman, Amla drives it down to long on
fullish around off and it's flicked to deep midwicket for one more
makes room to smash it down to mid off, there's a fumble, there's hesitation between the batsmen for one but they eventually complete it
full and wide outside off, Rossouw lets it go for it to be called wide, was just on the line maybe
rolls his fingers over the length ball outside off, driven down to long on and that's the 150 partnership
moves across for the incoming delivery and scoops it away over the fine leg boundary for six! Who said Amla doesn't play unorthodox shots!
on length outside off, tapped towards point with soft hands for one
makes room and swishes at it outside off, gets one to deep point
fullish outside off, chipped down the ground to long off for one
slower ball well outside off, Amla locks the target and goes down on a knee to heave it over the wide long on boundary for a massive six!
in the block hole outside off, Amla blocks it
and another one, six more! Too full and coming in, slammed over the midwicket boundary this time with the angle for another biggie. Amla into the 90s too
nearly a yorker outside off, blocked back
too low a full toss to be put away, pushes it back to the bowler
full and wide, slammed firmly straight to cover
he calls for two and gets two for his second ODI hundred, lets out a scream in celebration! The back of length ball from outside off was turned between deep midwicket and long on
slower one at 110kph outside off, heaved on the leg side in the air, straight to deep midwicket after a bounce
slower bouncer down leg, Amla adjusts and works it fine down the leg side with something like a slow-motion hook for four to beat short fine leg
full and wide outside off, Rossouw moves across to tap it on off but misses
slams it straight to cover by moving across again, fumble from Gayle gives them one
moves across and pushes the length delivery towards cover point for one
moves across to paddle the full ball fine down leg, but misses
misses again as he tries to drive that fullish delivery over the covers but doesn't connect
full delivery is slammed straight to deep cover for one
low full toss outside off is smashed down to long on for one
walks across and is hit on the shoe outside off, gets a leg bye on the leg side
wide and full way outside off, called wide
low and full outside off, firmly driven down the ground to long off
swishes at the full ball, goes straight to cover where Gayle misfields and they come back for the second as the throw is inaccurate
he doesn't middle it but it's going rolling down the ground towards long off, Rossouw says he'll come back for two and Amla gets his 19th hundred in ODI. This man's a run machine
it's almost going down leg and deflects off Amla's legs for four leg byes
it's full and wide and Rossouw hammers it just wide of deep cover through the aerial route for a one-bounce four
that's a full toss, don't think he has middled that but it goes all the way over long off! He wanted to smash it to leg and a top edge went straight down the ground all the way
middles it this time and gets six more, on the other side this time - over long on! Came down the track to take it on the full and smashed it down the ground
goes down on a knee on off and paddles it fine down leg to just beat short fine leg for four. It was a catch for the fielder but he couldn't get there
tries to hammer it on leg and gets one down to long on
full outside off, lofts it in the air down the ground to long on for one
they are sending nearly every ball out of the park! He made room this time and tonked the ball with the angle to the midwicket boundary for six!
what a clever shot, four more! Made some room for the short ball and opened the face of the bat in the end to guide it in the air over short third man for four
now too full and Amla doesn't miss these. Overpitched outside off and he drove it square of the wicket on the off side right in the gap for four
slightly full outside off and it's driven into the covers for two more
powers it to long on after making some room for one
short ball and he pulls it high and handsome for another maximum! Stayed on the back foot to let the ball come to him and launched it over midwicket. Yes, another six
the onslaught continues - the full delivery is smashed down to the long off boundary
finds the gap again, gets his front foot out of the way and slices it over point for another four
shuffles across to turn it to short fine leg for one

there's a wicket, some relief for WI as this one doesn't go all the way. Rossouw pulled the short ball on the leg side but didn't quite continue with the follow through and Carter took an easy high catch at deep midwicket
shuffles across and gets a run down to short fine leg
short of length outside off, he runs it down to third man for one
too full outside off and it's driven firmly to deep cover where Carter runs to his right and rolls over to cut it to two
is that Miller or Rossouw, it's six nevertheless! The full delivery was closer to the batsman now and he launched it over the wide long on boundary for six!
in the block hole just outside off, Miller drives and is lucky enough to get a thick outside edge fine on off for four
wider outside off and he swishes it to point
low full toss outside off, maybe Miller got an edge but it was too low to be caught as Ramdin stopped it with his pads

another edge, another four, Sammy is looking helpless! He bowled a slower ball on short of length, Miller pulled and mistimed it but the top edge went high and over the keeper on the off side for four
makes room, Russell pitches it wide outside off and Amla adjusts at the last moment to get enough bat and send it high and over the third man boundary for six. Was almost an upper cut

oh he's dragged it onto the stumps, Russell gets another wicket. Made room as usual, wanted to slam it on off but got an edge and the ball hit the off stump. A whirlwind and classy 133 comes to and end
it's a short ball outside off, Duminy leaves but it's a no ball as Russell knocked over the stumps with his hand
bouncer down the leg side as Duminy makes room, not given a wide but first bouncer for the over
there's nobody down the ground and Duminy gets his front foot out of the way to tonk it down to the long on boundary for four
short this time, Duminy gets a top edge with his pull and it goes right over the keeper for four in no man's land. Russell isn't happy

right in the block hole, Russell appeals for lbw as the ball goes behind to the keeper after hitting the boot. Duminy wants a run but goes back as Ramdin misses the direct hit. WI review it. Replays show there was no inside edge, it hit him in line and it's the umpire's call so Duminy survives as the umpire had said not out earlier
it's full, it's wide, it's six! Nearly went down on a knee and slammed it over the cover boundary right off the meat of the bat for six
he appeals for caught behind and gets the wicket! Miller tried to drive the fullish delivery outside off and get a thin outside edge which Ramdin caught easily
hammers it down to mid off where it goes through the fielder - Andre Russell - for four, right through his legs! Not what WI need right now
nearly in the block hole outside off, he digs it out on the off side for one
he shuffles across, Holder pitches it wide and it's called wide
goes across again and that's four more! It was on length outside off but he got inside the line and whipped it behind square on the leg side in the gap
last ball is tonked high with some power, fielder's coming under it but it crossed the rope down the ground, over long off for six! A pretty apt way to finish this innings

inn2.comm: loud appeal, all South Africans go up for caught behind but the umpire calls it a wide as it went across from short of length outside off, there was a sound for sure. SA review straightaway! Replays say the ball is legitimate, and Snicko spots the edge went the ball crossed the bat, the umpire overturns his decision. Gayle threw his bat at this wide delivery and only got an edge, what a start for South Africa
sends in another wide delivery, this one down leg for a wide
too full outside off and Smith crashes it over the covers for a cracking four. Nobody needs to move
chases and misses for the extra bounce. It was short and wide again, Smith went for the cut and missed
that's a cracker! Short ball outside off and Smith hammered it to the leg side with a powerful pull for four
presses forward and runs the length delivery to third man just past point for one
swings it into the batsman from length on middle, Deonarine looks to work it on leg but takes it on the pad
short of length outside off, Smith looks to pull it on leg and misses completely
makes room but de Lange pitches it right on off stump, no room and Smith defends it on off
bouncer over the batsman towards leg as he ducks under it, first of the over
on length on off, pushed between point and cover point for one
pokes his bat out for the ball outside off and gets a thick edge between gully and second slip for one
makes room to slam the ball on off, it's short of length on the stumps and he misses again
on length on the stumps, he defends on the leg side off the back foot
now a bouncer around middle stump, he sways out of the line and ducks to let it go
accurate inswinger towards off stump on length, the batsman defends it on the off side
makes room but the ball swings in and takes an inside edge to go down to the fine leg boundary for four. Dangerous but useful
that was almost a Gayle replay - short and wide outside off, he chases but doesn't get an edge. Wide called
top edge clears mid off! It was back of length and angled across, he pulled awkwardly as it wasn't too short and it went just over mid off
bouncer towards middle and leg and he ducks under it
short outside off, he makes room and chases it but misses as QDK collects it well over his head
pushes it uppishly but it's safe just wide of point! It was going away for four but Phangiso did well to cut it in
clears his front foot out of the way and slams the short ball over the long on boundary with a slap for six
fullish towards middle and leg, pushed down to mid on
on length outside off, pushed into the covers this time
making room helps this time - another four! It was well outside off and he sliced it away behind square on the off side
angled in from just outside off, he defends it back
back of length outside off, run down to third man for one
angled across outside off on length, he stays back and defends solidly
on length outside off with the angle, left alone
close to off outside off on length, left for the keeper again
down the leg side now, clipped off the pad for a leg bye to fine leg
full, that's launched high in the air but falls safe well out of mid-off's reach for two
makes room, taps the full delivery to cover point
short ball angled across, he watches it go to the keeper
low full toss outside off, pushed into the covers
short of length towards the batsman, pulled to deep backward square leg
makes room and slaps the back of length ball in the air just past the bowler to mid off, but no time for a run
he's smoked that for six! It was short, it was coming in and he sent it just over the deep midwicket fielder for six. Duminy thought he had a chance there, but it went over him
full and crashed down the ground over the non-striker's end for a powerful four. That was hit with some power!
outside off this time and he guides it to third man for one
dances down to make room and drives it uppishly over the covers from good length for another powerful four
on length around off, tapped to point off the back foot
nasty bouncer angled across, he sways out of the line and lets it go
wants to smack it on off but can't clear the length ball beyond cover
another powerful attempt but there's not much room and it goes down towards mid off
on middle stump on length, worked to the leg side off the back foot for one
on length towards off stump, he goes back and defends it on off side
too full around off, driven straight to cover point
short of length ball is slapped on the off side but Behardien dives to his left at cover point to stop it
turn straightaway from off stump, worked to the leg side off the back foot for one
turning in towards middle stump, he comes down and blocks it on leg
gets down on a knee and slog-sweeps it to the backward square leg boundary with the turn for four
comes down now and defends the length ball back from outside off
poor delivery on the pads and he sweeps it fine to the boundary behind square for another four
short of length outside off, he goes back and pulls it to long on, who takes it after a bounce
on length and angled in, Deonarine defends it on off
slightly wide outside off, he runs it down to third man for one
on middle and leg, slogged to deep midwicket for one
works the ball off the pads by staying on the back foot to deep midwicket for one
too full and wide, he chases it too but misses and it's a wide
pulled fiercely off the back foot, but straight to deep square leg for one
length delivery outside off, tapped to third man for one
pulls the ball to deep midwicket with the turn for one
flighted on length outside off, slogged to the leg side for one
pulled again with the turn to leg, wide of deep midwicket for one
darts it in this time towards middle and leg, steered to leg for one
length ball turning in from outside off, defends it on off
strays towards leg side and it's pulled with the turn to deep fine leg
nasty bouncer angled in, he ducks under it just in time

Parnell and de Kock are confident Deonarine is caught behind, they appeal, the umpire turns it down, they review it! It was a short ball down leg, Deonarine is cramped for room awkwardly and there was some sound. Replays suggest the ball brushed the elbow, not glove. The decision stays
taps the length delivery from off to backward point
that goes high but doesn't carry to sweeper cover! He drove the length ball uppishly in the air but didn't hit it very well so it didn't go all the way
wants to smack the ball to leg but the short of length ball doesn't bounce as much
drives the full delivery from off in the air down to long off for one
looks to sweep and gets a single behind square on leg for one
fullish on the pads, swats the ball to deep fine leg for one

given him, Phangiso strikes! This one came in with the angle, the arm ball, instead of turning away after pitching outside off and struck the front pad right in front of middle stump as Smith looked to defend on the front foot. That was plumb!
flighted outside off, pushed into the covers
slightly shorter outside off, punched into the covers
cuts it off the back foot to deep point for one
length delivery is steered to sweeper cover for one
bit of confusion as Deonarine is hit in the groin with the incoming delivery, Samuels wants a run but the batsman's not in a position for a quick single and he comes back in time
defends the length delivery on middle and leg back
short of length outside off, cut to point off the back foot
length delivery outside off is steered past a diving point for one. Du Plessis couldn't get there on time
back of length around off, thickish edge goes past point for one
it was headed towards off stump instead of turning away, cut to point dangerously

there's confusion, there's a run out chance, he's gone! Samuels got an inside edge to short fine leg, Deonarine wanted a run but Samuels never left his crease and Amla sent down the throw to Phangiso who did well to collect the ball and hit the stumps as Deonarine lost his bat while trying to make his ground
bit of flight on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
cut off the back foot past cover point for one
pushes forward to defend the flighted delivery on leg
goes back and works it from off to leg for one
drives the length delivery on the stumps down to mid on
waits for it and pushes the ball into the covers
wants to drive the ball down but a thick edge goes to point where Amla dives and stops it
strays towards leg now, Ramdin can't put it away
pushes the length ball down off the back foot to long on
there was almost a stumping chance as Samuels was about to lose his balance trying to work the ball down leg, wide though
back of length around off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
flighted on the pads, Samuels can't get it away
comes down and works the ball against the turn past midwicket for one
flat and angled in, worked to deep backward square leg for one
comes down the track and defends it back
drives this one from the middle of the bat to sweeper cover
length delivery on the stumps, blocks it on the front foot
fullish outside off, driven straight to cover
towards the pads and he works it towards deep backward square leg
low full toss on middle, driven down the ground to long on
fullish, driven powerfully into the covers where du Plessis dives to his right and gets a hand to it
full toss well outside off, driven firmly to sweeper cover in the gap for one
another full toss outside off, drives it down to long off for one more
flighted on middle and leg, steered to the leg side for one
flat and short oustide off as Samuels comes down and pushes it past the bowler for one
loud appeal for lbw as Ramdin sweeps and is struck in front of middle and leg, that was very very close and HawkEye says it was hitting but SA don't have reviews left
outside off now and it's pushed towards point
goes on the back foot now and works the ball to leg for one
waits for the ball and defends it bit too late, dangerously, just in front of off
cuts it in towards off and middle, clipped on the leg side for one
just back of length outside off, punched past point for one
strays down the leg side for a wide
back of length around off, Samuels defends it solidly close to himself
just outside off and Samuels taps it to point
angled in towards the batsman, he tucks it to leg for one
nice bouncer just outside off, Ramdin sways out of the line and lets it go
comes down the track to take it on the full and lofts the ball from outside leg against the turn to the midwicket boundary for six!
short and wide, turning away too, slapped back and Phangiso dives to his left to stop it
punched off the back foot and du Plessis puts in an effort at cover this time. Another dot ball
cut off the back foot after the turn to deep point for two
goes back in the crease and pushes the ball towards long on
makes room, he pitches it wide and Ramdin chases to cut it to deep point for one
back of length outside off, defended into the covers
waits for the back of length ball and taps it late, and dangerously, to the keeper after a bounce
strays towards middle and leg, Ramdin helps it down to fine leg
back of length delivery is defended towards short cover for a quick single
pushes the length delivery straight to cover
short of length and angled in, pulled to deep backward square leg
cuts the turning ball off the back foot to sweeper cover from outside off
he comes down and lofts the ball down to long on but the ball doesn't carry and Abbott runs to his right to keep it to one
Ramdin shows how it's done - takes it on the full by coming down and launches it right over long on for six
uses his feet again and slogs the ball to deep midwicket for two
cut off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
another six - this one from Samuels. He charged down and used the angle of the ball to slam it over the midwicket boundary
short of length outside off, cut to backward point where Amla dives to stop it
fullish outside off, driven down the ground to long off
angled in towards the stumps, he defends it back
too full and wide, Samuels drives it straight to sweeper cover for one
that's too short and Ramdin pulls it away behind square on the leg side to beat short fine leg for four
swishes at the ball towards cover for one
turns the short of length ball to deep square leg for one
makes room to swing the bat, which he does, but misses the length ball outside off
taps the short of length ball from outside off to backward point
makes room and slams the ball to mid on
clears his front foot to pull again but can't middle it and gets an inside edge onto his pad
another attempt to pull the short ball, he swings the bat and misses
gets a bottom edge for the slower length ball outside off, it bounces once before reaching the keeper
fullish and wide, driven powerfully but straight to deep cover after a bounce
short of length coming in, pulled to midwicket
that's too full and wide, Samuels jumps on it and lofts it with an inside out drive over the cover boundary for six!
that's gone too high, that's gone far as well, six more! Legcutter from Behardien just outside off and Samuels tonked it over the long on boundary
too full and Samuels smashes it straight down the ground for a four by beating long off
clipped off the pads to deep midwicket for one
tries to nudge the ball angled across towards third man, chases and misses
fuller on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket for one
short ball, hammered, goes all the way! Ramdin picked the length early and sent it flat over the midwicket boundary for a powerful six
fullish on the stumps, slogs it to deep midwicket for one more
taps the length delivery angled across to third man and that's the fifty for Samuels
in the block hole wide outside off, he tries to tap it on off but inside edge goes to fine leg for one. Time for drinks
loud appeal for catch from de Kock, stifled form Abbott, as Ramdin tried to slog it to leg but missed and the ball got his leg on the way before reaching the keeper
ducks under the bouncer which is called wide
swats a short of length ball to deep midwicket for one

middle stump knocked over! Samuels made room to smash it on the off side, misses it completely and the full delivery crashes into the middle stump. Umpire wants to check the no ball - it's very very close and tough to say if there was a part of the heel behind the line for sure. From one angle it looks like it's not a no ball. Samuels has to go back
short ball well outside off, he lets it go
another short ball, he ducks under it and lets it go
third short ball outside off, Russell smacks it with a pull wide of mid on in the gap for four

that's a spectacular catch from Amla! Parnell banged in the short ball, Ramdin stayed back and took his eyes off the ball but didn't drop his hands and it lobbed off the gloves towards midwicket where Amla ran to his right and dived to catch it just inches off the ground
short ball for Russell as well, it's well outside off and he misses the pull
makes a bit of room and pushes the short of length ball to mid off
length delivery outside off, left alone by Carter
on length on the off stump, he defends it back

wicket on the first ball, wicket on the last ball, and both off the short ball! Carter waited for the short ball to come to him and played the ramp shot by opening the face of the bat to guide the ball to third man where Abbott took a simple catch
he makes room and swats the short of length ball down to the long off region, as the fielder is in, for a one-bounce four
he tries to steer the short ball behind square on off but misses
the short balls won't stop, he stays back and hammers it to the midwicket boundary for a clean six
full this time and Russell smacks it straight down over the bowler's head to the long-off boundary for four more

that wasn't a shot, that was left alone for four! He made room, Abbott followed him with a short ball, Russell left the ball but didn't drop his hands and the ball goes off the bat just wide of the keeper on off for four
short of length outside off, defended to cover point for one

loud appeal for lbw, there was a sound, the umpire finally raises the finger! Parnell angled across a short of length ball, Russell tried to run it down to third man but only got a faint edge to de Kock

nearly run out! Holder defended the short of length ball to leg, wanted a run but was sent back immediately. Had Parnell struck with a direct hit, Holder would have been in trouble even though he slid in
angles across a length delivery outside off, he pokes and misses
he doesn't time it well and hands a simple catch to mid on! Short of length towards the off stump, Holder pulled and got a top edge as Rossouw got under the ball easily at mid on
swings his bat outside off for the angled delivery and misses

dropped, that was a simple catch and Duminy let it go! Sammy flicked the fullish ball off his pads in the air and straight to deep backward square leg where Duminy got into position, caught it too, but the ball popped out of his hands and rolled on to the boundary
deflects the ball off the pad towards midwicket as the ball comes in
low and slow full toss outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short of length outside off, turned to the leg side for one
pretty full outside off, Brathwaite pokes without any footwork and misses
tries a pull this time for the short delivery angled in but misses again
nudges the short of length ball to point but there's no time for a run
punches the ball off the back foot into the covers for one
swings outside off and sends the ball to third man in the air for one
attempted yorker is a full toss on the pads, flicked away through the midwicket region for easy four
nearly taken by the bowler! Full delivery outside off and it's smashed back, Parnell tried to catch it, it was traveling very fast, but the ball popped out and went for four
on the leg side, flicked off the pads for one
length delivery on the stumps, he defends it back
back of length outside off, guides it to third man for one
short ball angled in, gets a bit of glove on leg
drives the fuller delivery powerfully, but straight to mid on
de Lange gets a wicket! It was a back of length delivery outside off, Brathwaite went for a slog on the leg side and managed only an outside edge for easy catch to the keeper
short ball down the leg side for a wide
defends the length delivery angled in down to mid on
teasing line outside off, he looked to poke and withdrew his bat just in time
back of length around middle and leg, defended on the leg side
swing and a miss! It was on length outside off with the angle, he swung with power and missed
back of length on middle now, defended on the leg side again
whipped away from back of length on the leg side behind square, Duminy chases and slides but can't stop it
length ball on off is driven firmly to cover
goes across and works the ball to deep midwicket for one to keep strike
touch short of length outside off, pushed to point
short ball down the leg side for a wide. One bouncer for the over
124kph, fuller on the stumps, driven firmly down to mid-off
right in the block on off stump, Sammy gets his bat down in time to block and even applauds for the good delivery
goes back and whips the ball off the hips to fine leg but decides not to run
pulls the short ball to the wide long on region in the gap, it falls safe and rolls away for four
gets a bouncer on the last ball, Sammy wanted a run but he has to duck under this one
length delivery on off stump, pushed down towards mid off
back of length this time, he stays back and defends
around off stump again, Cottrell pushes that to cover point off the back foot
angled in from short of length, deflects off the pad to the leg side
short of length delivery just outside off, he lets it go
pushes at the length delivery outside off, it's gone in the gap and Sammy asks "soldier" to come back for the second. Bit of fumble at third man ensures they get a second
he tries to whip the ball on leg but gets a top edge and it falls safely well before deep midwicket, enough time for two
short of length around off, he defends it back
strays down the leg side for a wide
good-length delivery outside off, pushed back to the bowler

it's over, Behardien finishes it off as Sammy chops the ball onto his stumps. It was outside off with some room, Sammy wanted to cut it behind square off the back foot but got an edge to rattle his stumps
